CustomField.description: Comma-separated list of HTTP status codes that indicate a successful callout (e.g., "200,201,202"). If not specified, default success codes (200-299) will be used.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter comma-separated HTTP status codes that indicate success (e.g., "200,201,202" or "200,201,202,204"). If left blank, any status code between 200-299 will be considered successful.
CustomField.label: Success Codes
